<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/0c211734aa3181796605d8a8dd372f03/tumblr_inline_ngngf3SJRG1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>Sorry, students of the world. We hope your bad grades are worth it in the end </p>
I have that problem right now....

No worries. You only broke my japanese patrol plane.

I have something else to make up for that, however. XD

Have a croissant, squad. (haha. provided by the dassault corporation.)
Ya I should really be studying now lol.

So... any interns at squad happen to point this out

Yes, its a proble.... Oh wait, I forgot to check out that new part, let's start up KSP again...

Fortunately xmas is the end of the week, so I don't think we'l fail toooooo many subjects.

Cheers
Ha ha! I have foiled you! I had finals already! Nanner nanner.
I got Finals in the bag ,cause i'm going to attempt to wing it like I usually do which dos end up working out pretty well.
Muahahaha! Thought you could outfox me, but nooooo -- you released it at almost the exact moment I submitted my last final of the semester! Thank you for the present, Squad!

I don't care: I finished my last exam today.

A very good day for me: no more exam(finally, vacations!), I can play Spore as long as I want( i got this game yesterday from a friend) and they release 0.90.0

(also, as I'm vacation, I'll have whole day to try every single new feature, without worrying about grade and finals)

yes, I'm being very very very mean toward those who still have exams
Ha ha, Jokes on you! I finished my exams already, about thirteen years ago!
Yea..... Should be studying for a calculus final...

Wow. I still have English, AP World, Chemistry, and Spanish exams...

So many sonnets.
Great, just when I thought there was hope we might land humans on Mars in my lifetime, Squad has to go and ruin the education of this generation. Dammit Squad!
Squad, you rascals
I am glad to live in a country with such freedom. Australian universities have been out for over a month.

Cool and all, but I've got 3 factors working in my favor.

In order of relevance:

1. I'm waiting for several of my essential mods to update.

2. I graduated from high school a while ago (2007) Passed most courses with flying colors (top was a 95 in Physics). The exception was English class, because nothing ruins a good book like having to do a book report on it.

3. I tried college, but the whole concept of being forced to take courses that are provably not related in any way to your desired degree turned me off of the whole concept.

Edited December 16, 2014 by SciMan

Hahahaha, Squad, thinking yo-

oh

the day Beta Then Ever was released, I was diagnosed with Bronchitis!

Hahhahaah

thanks for the school break and also for a get well present
Squad, this joke is a bit late, you should have posted it years ago saying "Knows you have a life and sh** to do - Decides to make a game called "Kerbal Space Program"."
I as of yet have gotten fairly good grades on my finals. KSP BETA is the reward.
thank god it was released during the christmas holidays... and that i'm only in year 10 so it doesn't even matter...
